lexUnit.name: bolt.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a long pin with a head that screws into a nut, used to fasten things together, a bar that slides into a socket to fasten a door or window

sentence.text: Shortly afterwards Dave placed a protection bolt in the roof just above the pegs .
